basic.description: A detailed study of plays by Corneille, Racine, Molière. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.Given jointly with FREN 418/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre classique

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.)
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN306; FREN418.
